text: Phil Alden Robinson (born March 1, 1950) is an American movie director and screenwriter. His best-known movies are Field of Dreams, Sneakers, and The Sum of All Fears. He was born in Long Beach, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from New York (state) Category:Screenwriters from New York (state) Category:Emmy Award winning directors
title: Phil Alden Robinson
